dishes.name: Truffle Mushroom Risotto
dishes.description: Luxurious Italian comfort food at its finest. Creamy Arborio rice slow-cooked to perfection, elevated with aromatic black truffle oil and a medley of wild forest mushrooms, finished with aged Parmesan.

dishes.name: Crispy Calamari
dishes.description: Mediterranean classic with a kick. Tender squid rings delicately breaded with seasoned flour and flash-fried until golden. Accompanied by homemade spicy aioli and fresh lemon wedges.

dishes.name: Bruschetta Trio
dishes.description: A vibrant Italian appetizer featuring three flavor variations. Artisan sourdough toasted to perfection, topped with classic tomato basil, creamy mozzarella with basil pesto, and sweet roasted red peppers.

dishes.name: Asian Lettuce Wraps
dishes.description: Light and flavorful Asian-inspired appetizer. Crisp butter lettuce cups filled with wok-tossed chicken, water chestnuts, and fresh vegetables, glazed with sweet hoisin sauce.

dishes.name: Shrimp Ceviche
dishes.description: Fresh and zesty Latin American delicacy. Wild-caught shrimp marinated in fresh citrus juices with cilantro, red onions, and creamy avocado. A refreshing burst of coastal flavors.

dishes.name: Grilled Salmon Fillet
dishes.description: Premium Atlantic salmon grilled to perfection with a beautiful char. Served atop tender asparagus spears and drizzled with classic lemon butter sauce. A heart-healthy choice that doesn't compromise on flavor.

dishes.name: Beef Tenderloin Steak
dishes.description: The crown jewel of steaks. Premium 8oz center-cut tenderloin, grilled to your exact preference and topped with compound herb butter. Accompanied by seasonal roasted vegetables and a rich red wine reduction.

dishes.name: Chicken Parmesan
dishes.description: Italian-American comfort classic. Tender chicken breast breaded with Italian herbs, pan-fried until golden, then blanketed with house-made marinara and melted mozzarella. Served over al dente spaghetti.

dishes.name: Vegetarian Buddha Bowl
dishes.description: A colorful celebration of plant-based nutrition. Fluffy quinoa topped with rainbow roasted vegetables, crispy chickpeas, creamy avocado, and drizzled with nutty tahini dressing. Wholesome and satisfying.

dishes.name: Seafood Paella
dishes.description: Authentic Spanish coastal cuisine. Saffron-infused rice cooked in a traditional paella pan with jumbo shrimp, plump mussels, tender calamari, and aromatic Spanish spices. A feast for the senses.

dishes.name: Lamb Rack with Mint Sauce
dishes.description: Elegant New Zealand lamb rack, herb-crusted and roasted to tender perfection. Served with crispy rosemary potatoes and traditional mint jelly. A sophisticated choice for discerning palates.

dishes.name: Thai Red Curry
dishes.description: Authentic Thai comfort in a bowl. Rich coconut curry simmered with tender chicken, bamboo shoots, Thai basil, and vibrant vegetables. Aromatic, spicy, and deeply satisfying. Served with fragrant jasmine rice.

dishes.name: Lobster Linguine
dishes.description: Luxurious Italian seafood masterpiece. Fresh lobster tail meat tossed with al dente linguine in a delicate garlic white wine sauce, finished with butter, fresh herbs, and a touch of cream. Pure indulgence.

dishes.name: Tiramisu
dishes.description: The iconic Italian dessert done right. Delicate ladyfinger cookies soaked in espresso and coffee liqueur, layered with rich mascarpone cream, and dusted with premium cocoa powder. A coffee lover's dream.

dishes.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
dishes.description: Decadent chocolate indulgence. Individual cake with a crispy exterior hiding a molten chocolate center that flows like lava when cut. Served warm with a scoop of vanilla bean ice cream. Pure bliss.

dishes.name: Crème Brûlée
dishes.description: Classic French elegance in dessert form. Silky vanilla bean custard topped with a perfectly caramelized sugar crust that cracks under your spoon. Garnished with fresh seasonal berries.

dishes.name: Mango Cheesecake
dishes.description: Tropical twist on a timeless favorite. Velvety cream cheese filling swirled with fresh mango purée, resting on a buttery graham cracker crust. Topped with mango compote and fresh fruit.

dishes.name: Espresso Martini
dishes.description: The perfect pick-me-up cocktail. Premium vodka shaken with freshly pulled espresso, coffee liqueur, and a touch of simple syrup. Served ice-cold with a beautiful crema foam top.

dishes.name: Passion Fruit Mojito
dishes.description: Tropical refreshment with a twist. Fresh mint leaves muddled with lime and exotic passion fruit pulp, mixed with premium white rum and topped with sparkling soda water. Summer in a glass.

dishes.name: Organic Green Smoothie
dishes.description: A refreshing organic juice made with fresh fruits and vegetables, perfect for hot summer days. This nutrient-packed smoothie combines the earthy goodness of leafy greens with the natural sweetness of tropical fruits.

dishes.name: Artisan Lemonade
dishes.description: House-made from scratch with freshly squeezed lemons and your choice of aromatic herbs. Options include classic mint, fragrant basil, or earthy rosemary. Perfectly balanced sweet and tart.

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.comment: Absolutely incredible dining experience! The Lobster Linguine was the best I've ever had.

reviews.name: Michael Chen
reviews.comment: The Beef Tenderloin was cooked to perfection. Outstanding service and ambiance!

reviews.name: Emma Williams
reviews.comment: Great vegetarian options! The Buddha Bowl was fresh and delicious.

reviews.name: David Martinez
reviews.comment: Amazing Seafood Paella! Authentic Spanish flavor and generous portions.

reviews.name: Lisa Thompson
reviews.comment: The Chocolate Lava Cake is to die for! Perfect ending to a perfect meal.

reviews.name: James Anderson
reviews.comment: Excellent food and atmosphere. The Thai Red Curry had the perfect amount of spice!
